message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm making the first move, so a slight advantage for me is only fair.  This round is our best chance to secure the most value.
Come on Bob, 58-42 is a better compromise. We're both losing value each round!
Alice, we're running out of time! This offer is fair and gives us both a decent share. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, we're both losing a lot to inflation. 56-44 is a fair split, let's end this!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than fair and avoids further losses.  Take the deal now, or we both lose!
